title: The Oberon submarine
creator_credit: Australia. Navy Office. Directorate of Public Relations and Vincent Donovan
brief_description: Illustrates the Royal Australian Navy’s latest class of submarine. Four of these Oberon submarines are now in use and two others are to be built.
